Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-02

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript 5.7+ + Angular 19.2+ (standalone), @ngrx/signals 19.2+, RxJS 7.5+, Angular Material 19.2+, Bootstrap 5.3 (utilities) (001-garden-room-structural-logic)
- N/A (in-memory calculation; persisted state out of scope) (001-garden-room-structural-logic)
- TypeScript 5.7+ (strict mode) + Angular 19.2+, ag-grid-enterprise 33.3+, (001-ag-grid-ng-select-demo)
- N/A (in-memory data generation only) (001-ag-grid-ng-select-demo)
- TypeScript 5.7+ with strict mode enabled + Angular 19.2+, Angular Material 19.2+, ng-select, (001-spx-magic-selector)
- In-memory mock data service (no persistence for initial (001-spx-magic-selector)
- TypeScript 5.7+ (strict mode) + Angular 19.2+, jsoneditor ^9.10.5 (already installed), (001-jsoneditor-scroll-demo)
- Not applicable (demo component with hardcoded JSON samples) (001-jsoneditor-scroll-demo)

- TypeScript 5.7+ (strict mode) with Angular 19.2+ (001-config-manager)
